text:
• Assessed appropriate treatment of taxable and deductible temporary differences.
⇒Valuation allowanceを計上している場合、事業計画の合理性を検証をしていませんので、 Valuation allowanceが正しいか分かりませんので、適切に処理されているか検証でき ないと思います。
trans:
・Assessed appropriate treatment of taxable and deductible temporary differences.
=> If a valuation allowance has been recorded, we have not verified the rationality of the business plan. Therefore, we are unable to determine whether the valuation allowance is accurate or whether it has bene appropriately processed.
